channel.title: Help uploading my client to players
channel.description: Can someone show me how to possibly make my client a .exe file?

item.title: Help uploading my client to players
item.dc:creator: @Scape-JAVA Scape-JAVA
item.description:
@Scape-JAVA wrote:

[quote=“Fat Cookies, post:3, topic:304295”][quote author=Scape-JAVA link=topic=400586.msg2970316#msg2970316 date=1253919819]
save as an exe. File i’m not 100% sure but what ever Cause i don’t use EXE.
[/quote]
This is wrong.

Do not convert your client to a windows exeutable because it makes it platform dependent and its pointless. If you want to compress all your client data into a file make it into a jar file which is not platform dependent and is the official way.

Even though jdk does come with a command line jar archiver, it is best for beginners to use Jar Maker.[/quote]

=[ i’m wrong

Read full topic
item.source: Help uploading my client to players

item.title: Help uploading my client to players
item.dc:creator: @Fat_Cookies Fat Cookies
item.description:
@Fat_Cookies wrote:

Scape-JAVA:

save as an exe. File i’m not 100% sure but what ever Cause i don’t use EXE.

This is wrong.

Do not convert your client to a windows exeutable because it makes it platform dependent and its pointless. If you want to compress all your client data into a file make it into a jar file which is not platform dependent and is the official way.

Even though jdk does come with a command line jar archiver, it is best for beginners to use Jar Maker.

Read full topic
